co.janicek.core.html.ColorCore

type
class
Color functions.

Static Variables

public MAX_COLOR_COMPONENT(inline,null) : Int

Static Methods

public inline colorFraction( fraction : Float ) : Int

Convert a fraction (0.0 - 1.0) to a color value (0 - 255).

public intToHexColor( color : Int ) : String

parameters
color Int color value.
returns
HTML color string.
Make HTML hex color string from Int value. Example: #000000

public interpolateColor( color0 : Int, color1 : Int, f : Float ) : Int

Interpolate color between color0 and color1 using fraction f. When f==0, result is color0. When f==1, result is color1.

public rgba( red : Int, green : Int, blue : Int, ?alpha : Float ) : String

parameters
red Red channel (0 - 255).
green Green channel (0 - 255).
blue Blue channel (0 - 255).
?alpha Optional alpha channel (0.0 - 1.0).
Make HTML rgba(r,g,b,a) color string.

public rgbaFraction( red : Float, green : Float, blue : Float, ?alpha : Float ) : String

parameters
red Red channel (0.0 - 1.0).
green Green channel (0.0 - 1.0).
blue Blue channel (0.0 - 1.0).
?alpha Optional alpha channel (0.0 - 1.0).
Make HTML rgba(r,g,b,a) color string using fractions.
